title: Chicken curry with apricots
ingredients: ['20 dried apricots', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 x 1.5 kg chickens, jointed', '3 finely sliced onions', '1 teaspoon grated ginger', '3-4 garlic cloves, crushed', '2-3 green chillies, seeded and finely chopped', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1¼ teaspoon chilli powder', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '4 cardamom pods, bruised', '4 large tomatoes, each peeled and cut into 8 pieces']
